U

Unit - Class in <Unnamed>
The ancestor class Unit, representing a character in the world

Only Storing the properties for units.

UnitManager - Class in <Unnamed>
Manage all units including the player and other character Handles the creations, actions, updates and renderings
UnitManager(String, String, String) - Constructor for class UnitManager
Instantiates a new unit manager.
UNITS_PATH - Static variable in class Unit
Location of the "units" directory
update() - Method in class Camera
Update the game camera to re-centre its viewpoint around the player .
